metadata.summary: Advanced detection rules that track event sequences over time using with_child, with_descendant, and with_events to detect multi-stage attacks and temporal patterns.
metadata.primary_use_case: Detect multi-event sequences like process chains, repeated failed logins, or time-based attack patterns

cross_refs.description: Stateful rules can be applied to different targets including deployment, artifact, and audit events
Stateful rules generate detections that may need false positive filtering
